latest_revision.text:
Classes information can be included on events page. Robert Andrews

I'd agree with you. Workshop_Policy and Events might be best merged and cleaned up as well - Eric Ose

Looks more like Classes, Workshop_Policy, Events, and Presentations should all be combined with things moved to their relevant sections. Perhaps we could have a past events page or something. - Eric Ose

I went ahead and merged all of Workshop Policy, Presentations, Classes to Events. I hope I wasn't jumping on this too quickly. Please forgive me if I overstepped - Robert Andrews
